author: The Hindu
title: Coronavirus impact: Bengaluru’s auto drivers struggle due to lockdown
description: Forced to stay home, many of them, without daily incomes, are hampered financially
content: Auto driver Sampangi K, 36, gets, on average, eight rides every day, with which he makes about 500. He uses most of the earnings to run his home and repay his vehicle loan of 1.8 lakh. The nation-wide lockdown due to the COVID-19 outbreak, however, has stoppe… [+2704 chars]
